Game.Name: European Club Soccer (Europe)
Game.plot: European Club Soccer brings the Big Match excitement of Europe's favorite sport to the Sega Genesis. Play over 170 teams from around the world and compete for the Super Cup, soccer's highest accolade and exclusive to European Club Soccer!Cheat: PasswordsEnter the following at the password screen:Cheat: PasswordsGo to "Simulation" and "Enter Password" to input the characters. Use button A and B to change the letters, left and right buttons to change characters, and C button to confirm.
Game.Notes: European Club Soccer is a football game developed by Krisalis Software and published by Virgin Games for the Sega Mega Drive in 1992. It is a derivative of Krisalis' earlier football game, Manchester United Europe, specifically the version released for the 16-bit Amiga and Atari ST computers in early 1991.
